title: Open MPI new versions 3.1.3, 3.0.3; sha256 checksums added
body:
## Actions:
1. Add Open MPI versions 3.1.3, 3.0.3 (including updating libmpi.so)
2. Switch from MD5 checksums to sha256 checksums for improved security (v2.0.0-3.1.3).
